Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

yesterday I finally finished my video about one of my favorite crafts after 1.0 release. It is a two stage to orbit spaceplane but fully recoverable. 

It is fully stock and only needs tech level 4 plane parts and full tech level 3, as well as only level 1 buildings. So very useful for career mode.

Costs for orbit with a recovery mod are only 766 funds. I don't know if you can do this cheaper with this tech level.

I'm glad to hear what you think about it ;-) .

Here's the video (with some further information):

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Hi0umfBRh4Y?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
